attributes.action: Government should default on PFI deals.
attributes.additional_details:
PFI corporations borrowed money from the banks in order to render taxpayers indebted for years, the banks failed, and now we, the taxpayers, have bailed out the banks, leaving us doubly indebted. The government should, therefore, default on PFI payments.
It's only fair, and nobody will suffer apart from rich, greedy shysters.
